name: AssetGurus
tag_list: itam, it-asset-management, itil, it-inventory, it-audit, data-reconciliation, compliance, datacenter-management, facilities-management, fixed-asset-management, enterprise-integration, rfid, spares-management, vizualization
description: IT and Datacenter Inventory and Audit
overview:
AssetGurus provides IT inventory, audit, database reconciliation, and compliance services to mid- and enterprise-level businesses.

Clients include EA, Salesforce, Yahoo, and other it asset intensive enterprises.

AssetGurus has specialized software that allows large-scale inventories of barcoded assets to be performed both quickly and with enhanced accuracy. Auditors are deployed on-site at clients’ facilities to collect data. Data analysts go through this data line-by-line to confirm its accuracy, then tie each row to relevant datasources in the client’s data environment. Deliverables are formatted based on client specifications, from Excel to SQL. Once the project is completed, follow-on services can include spot-audits to keep repository data fresh, or business-process management consulting to bring the client in line with IT Asset Management best practices.

AssetGurus has partnered with a leading datacenter management software firm to bring new software to the marketplace, featuring top-down and per-stack visualization, RFID, android-based tablets for on-site work, and robust spares management.
